documentation.text: Assign the contract to an owner
Look up the address of the owner
Check if the calling address is the owner of the contract
Define a function to renounce ownerhip
Define a public function to transfer ownership
Define an internal function to transfer ownership

constructor.notice: Assign the contract to an owner

isOwner().notice: Check if the calling address is the owner of the contract

owner().notice: Look up the address of the owner

renounceOwnership().notice: Define a function to renounce ownerhip
